Uses of Class
org.tms.api.io.XLSOptions

  • Packages that use XLSOptions 
    Package Description
    org.tms.api.factories
    Exceptions thrown by TMS events.
    org.tms.api.io
    Options to import and export Tables to a variety of formats.

    • Uses of XLSOptions in org.tms.api.factories

      Methods in org.tms.api.factories with parameters of type XLSOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TableContext TableContextFactory.importWorkbook(String fileName, XLSOptions format) 
      static TableContext TableContextFactory.importWorkbook(String fileName, XLSOptions format, TableContext tc) 

    • Uses of XLSOptions in org.tms.api.io

      Fields in org.tms.api.io declared as XLSOptions 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static XLSOptions XLSOptions.Default
      Constant with the most common MS Excel import and export configuration options already set.
      Methods in org.tms.api.io that return XLSOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      XLSOptions XLSOptions.withBlanksAsNull()
      Enables the treatment of blank MS Excel cells as null values in TMS Table Cells.
      XLSOptions XLSOptions.withBlanksAsNull(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables the treatment of blank MS Excel cells as null values in TMS Table Cells.
      XLSOptions XLSOptions.withCommentAuthor(String author)
      Sets the Comment Author string to prepend to TableElement Description fields when they are exported to Excel cell comments.
      XLSOptions XLSOptions.withDerivations()
      Enable the import of Excel cell formulas as TMS TableElement Derivations, and the export of Derivations to Excel cell formulas.
      XLSOptions XLSOptions.withDerivations(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables translation of MS Excel cell formulas to TMS TableElement Derivations on import, and Derivations to Excel cell formulas on export.
      XLSOptions XLSOptions.withDescriptions()
      Enables the translation of TMS TableElement Description fields to Excel cell comments on export, and the translation of Excel cell comments to TMS Description fields on import.
      XLSOptions XLSOptions.withDescriptions(boolean enabled)
      Enable or disable the translation of TMS TableElement Description fields to Excel cell comments on export, and the translation ofExcel cell comments to TMS Description fields on import.
      XLSOptions XLSOptions.withXlsFormat()
      When exporting, generates an MS Excel xls file, readable by older versions of MS Excel.
      XLSOptions XLSOptions.withXlsXFormat()
      When exporting, generates an MS Excel xlsx file, readable by recent versions of MS Excel.
